results.content: great for practice. HTML and CSS are nothing but practices i believe. There's no complex logic. but without enough practices, you will surely encounter some difficulties..  In that context, this type of course is very helpful.

results.content: This is a very good way to practice coding a responsive website with Bootstrap. The pace is fast at some points, but he explains things really well.

results.content:
Really great practical example work. Lack of theory makes this course robust and light weighted, but that requires students do some research concerning the theory behind the manipulations elsewhere.
Basically, the instructor shows all what's and how's and a student is to learn why's independently.
